title: Hour 3 – Will Blackmon (07-09-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 – Will Blackmon (07-09-20)
description:
FOX Sports Radio hosts Chris Broussard and Rob Parker are in for Dan and the Danettes, and they wonder if Ravens QB Lamar Jackson deserves to be paid like Chiefs QB Patrick Mahomes. They talk about Stephen Jackson’s apology for making anti-Semitic comments and NFL veteran Will Blackmon joins the show to explain why Patrick Mahomes’ new contract makes total sense.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
